subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Frank Spaziani, a long-time assistant at Boston College who was passed over for the head coaching job in 2006, was named Tuesday to succeed Jeff Jagodzinski, who was fired last week after two seasons when he interviewed for the Jets’ coaching job. Spaziani, 61, built top defenses during his 10 years as coordinator with the Eagles. ¶Utah Coach Kyle Whittingham might have been the only coach to cast a No. 1 vote for his team, but his fellow coaches gave him a consolation prize by naming him the American Football Coaches Association’s coach of the year in the Football Bowl Subdivision. Whittingham’s Utes went 13-0 and beat Alabama in the Sugar Bowl for the best record in the program’s 115-year history. Utah also has the longest current bowl winning streak at eight with Whittingham winning the last four. But Utah finished No. 2 in The Associated Press poll and fourth in the coaches’ final poll. coach.
snippet: Frank Spaziani, a long-time assistant at Boston College who was passed over for the head coaching job in 2006, was named Tuesday to succeed Jeff Jagodzinski, who was fired last week after two seasons when he interviewed for the Jets’ coaching job....
